forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High around 5C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High near 40F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers this evening, becoming a steady rain overnight. Areas of freezing rain possible. Low 2C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers this evening, becoming a steady rain overnight. Areas of freezing rain possible. Low near 35F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday

forecastday.fcttext: Evening rain followed by a mix of rain and snow showers late. Low around 35F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 70%.

forecastday.fcttext: More clouds than sun. High 44F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers late at night. Low 34F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
